title: AN INTERN'S VISIT TO AASTHA PARIVAAR UNIT 2
content: On the 5th of February, 2019, I, along with three other interns, had the privilege of visiting Aastha Parivaar Unit 2 to learn about the work they do in their community and the issues they face.
author: John Doe

title: HIV Untreated
content: Aastha Parviaar’s 13 community based organisations (CBOs) throughout Mumbai, Thane and Pune work to empower the lives of sex workers and prevent the spread of HIV through testing, education and treatment.
author: Jane Smith

title: 2018 International Women’s Day Remembered
content: Aastha Parivaar Unit 2 (AP 2) and Targeted Intervention Centre, Aasha Darpaan (AD), support a community of female sex workers (FSW) in the Grant Road suburb of Mumbai.
author: Jane Smith

title: Amazon Wishlist in the Community
content: Aastha Parivaar works with sex workers, transgender individuals and wider marginalised communities throughout three districts of Maharashtra; Mumbai, Thane and Pune.
author: Jane Smith
